dcterms:creator: K. Kuru
H. Yetgin
dcterms:description: The PilotAware ATOM-GRID Network detects all aircraft transmitting an electronic conspicuity (EC) signal for specific types of aircraft, providing real-time low latency data feeds for collision management.
dcterms:title: PilotAware ATOM-GRID Network

dcterms:creator: M. Pálenská
S. L. Brázdilová
P. Cásek
L. Korenˇciak
dcterms:description: FLARM is a low-power ADS-B system designed for general aviation operating in low altitude airspace, providing traffic information to enhance situational awareness.
dcterms:title: FLARM

dcterms:creator: M. Pálenská
S. L. Brázdilová
P. Cásek
L. Korenˇciak
dcterms:description: ADS-B is a surveillance technology that allows aircraft to determine their position via satellite navigation and periodically broadcast it, enhancing situational awareness.
dcterms:title: ADS-B

dcterms:description: NASA Langley Research Center conducted flight tests to demonstrate onboard autonomous sense and avoid technologies for unmanned aerial systems in scenarios involving non-conforming UAVs.
dcterms:title: NASA Langley Research Center Flight Tests

dcterms:creator: A. Weinert
S. Campbell
A. Vela
D. Schuldt

dcterms:description: The UAS Executive Committee (EXCOM) Science and Research Panel (SARP) provides definitions and recommendations for small unmanned aircraft systems based on collision risk assessments.
dcterms:title: UAS Executive Committee (EXCOM) Science and Research Panel (SARP) Definitions

dcterms:creator: J. Boubeta-Puig

dcterms:description: US Federal Aviation Administration reports provide insights into the architecture for autonomous UAVs designed for remote sensing and intelligent decision-making.

dcterms:creator: D. Wang
T. Fan
T. Han
J. Pan
dcterms:description: Collision avoidance systems literature discusses various approaches, including a two-stage reinforcement learning method for multi-UAV collision avoidance under imperfect sensing conditions.
dcterms:title: Collision Avoidance Systems Literature

dcterms:creator: D. Wang
T. Fan
T. Han
J. Pan
dcterms:description: Various machine learning techniques are explored for their application in collision avoidance systems, particularly in the context of UAVs.
